text: Nu Image is an American film studio that was founded by Avi Lerner, Trevor Short, Danny Dimbort, and Danny Lerner in 1992. The company produces action films, most of which are filmed primarily in South Africa and Bulgaria (by 2005 acquired Nu Boyana Film Studios)https://www.screendaily.com/nu-image- acquires-boyana-film-studios-in-bulgaria/4025769.ar, among other locations. In 1996, the company launched a subsidiary label called Millennium Films, now called Millennium Media. ==Nu Image films and franchises== *Danger Zone (1996) *Cyborg Cop (1993-1996) *Deadly Outbreak (1996) *Top of the World (1997) *Bridge of Dragons (1999) *Shark Attack (1999–2004) *Spiders (2000 film) *U.S. Seals II: The Ultimate Force (2001) *Detention (2003 film) *Killer Rats (2003 film) *Raging Sharks (2005) *Terminal 105 (2005) *Undisputed II: Last Man Standing (2006) and Undisputed III: Redemption (2010) *The Black Dahlia (2006) *16 Blocks (2006) *The Wicker Man (2006) *88 Minutes (2007) *Day of the Dead (2008) and Day of the Dead: Bloodline (2018) *Rambo (2008) *The Prince and Me 3: A Royal Honeymoon (2008) and The Prince and Me: The Elephant Adventure (2010) *Ninja series (2009-2013) *Direct Contact (2009) *The Expendables (2010-2014) *Drive Angry (2011) *The Mechanic (2011) *Conan the Barbarian (2011) *The Expendables 2 (2012) *Olympus Has Fallen (2013) *The Expendables 3 (2014) *Survivor (2015) *London Has Fallen (2016) *Criminal (2016) *Mechanic: Resurrection (2016) *Security (2017) *The Hitman's Bodyguard (2017) *Leatherface (2017) *Hunter Killer (2018) *Hellboy (2019) *Angel Has Fallen (2019) *Rambo: Last Blood (2019) *Kill Chain (2019) *The Outpost (2020) *Tesla (2020) *The Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard (2021) ==References== ==External links== * *Avi Lerner’s Millennium Entertainment Up for Sale (EXCLUSIVE) on Variety.com Category:Film distributors of the United States Category:Film production companies of the United States Category:Mass media companies established in 1992 Category:Entertainment companies of the United States Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:Non-theatrical film production companies Category:1992 establishments in California
title: Nu Image
